summary: The diff shows a partial implementation focused on frontend scaffolding and routing. Basic layouts, authentication hooks, and placeholder admin/client pages are present. However, the BuildRequest demands extensive backend logic (Motoko actors for wallets, ROI engines, binary matching, reward engines), complete frontend pages with all specified content, and full integration. The diff is heavily truncated, making it difficult to verify most requirements. Based on visible evidence, many core features are missing or incomplete.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create public website landing page with hero section displaying headline 'Borderless Payments. Limitless Possibilities.', subtext 'Modern digital finance platform for global transactions', Get Started and Login buttons, and visual elements representing secure shield and digital network
missing_requirements.reason: LandingPage.tsx is referenced in routing but file content is not provided in the diff

missing_requirements.requirement: Create About section on public website explaining AXOPAY capabilities
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of About section implementation in any visible file

missing_requirements.requirement: Create Problem-Solution section on public website
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of Problem-Solution section in any visible file

missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of Security & Trust section in any visible file

missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of Global Capability section in any visible file

missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of Plans & Benefits section in any visible file

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement client authentication system with login, OTP verification, and forgot password functionality
missing_requirements.reason: LoginPage and ForgotPasswordPage are referenced but not shown; no backend validation or OTP generation logic visible in backend/main.mo

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement client sign-up system with wallet creation, unique user ID generation, sponsor linking, and OTP verification
missing_requirements.reason: SignupPage is referenced but not shown; backend/main.mo shows no user registration, wallet creation, or OTP logic

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement separate admin authentication portal with 2FA and optional IP restriction
missing_requirements.reason: AdminLoginPage exists but shows no 2FA enforcement logic; backend has no admin authentication or IP restriction implementation

missing_requirements.requirement: Create client dashboard displaying wallet balance, active plan, ROI progress, earnings, team size, and recent transactions
missing_requirements.reason: DashboardPage uses mock data with no backend integration; no queries or API calls to fetch real data

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement wallet features for deposit, withdrawal, internal transfers, currency conversion, and transaction history with three wallet types
missing_requirements.reason: WalletPage is referenced but not shown; backend/main.mo has no wallet engine, transaction, or currency conversion logic

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement plan management system for purchasing/upgrading plans with ROI tracker and repurchase option
missing_requirements.reason: PlansPage is referenced but not shown; backend has no plan purchase, ROI tracking, or expiry logic

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement ROI engine that automatically calculates and credits daily returns
missing_requirements.reason: Backend/main.mo shows no ROI calculation engine, scheduler, or earnings crediting logic

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement referral module with personal referral link, downline list, team tree, and earnings summary
missing_requirements.reason: ReferralPage is referenced but not shown; backend has no referral tracking or downline management

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement binary system with left/right team structure, pair matching, daily limits, and carry-forward
missing_requirements.reason: BinaryPage shows mock data only; backend has no binary tree placement or matching logic

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement binary matching engine that calculates matched pairs and credits earnings
missing_requirements.reason: Backend/main.mo shows no binary matching engine or pair calculation logic

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement rewards section displaying milestone rewards with progress indicators
missing_requirements.reason: RewardsPage is referenced but not shown; no milestone or progress tracking in backend

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement reward engine that triggers payouts when milestones are achieved
missing_requirements.reason: Backend/main.mo shows no milestone monitoring or automatic payout logic

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement earnings and transactions section with filters and categorization
missing_requirements.reason: EarningsPage is referenced but not shown; no transaction filtering or categorization in backend

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement profile and settings section for updating information and security settings
missing_requirements.reason: ProfilePage is referenced but not shown; backend has no user profile update or KYC handling

missing_requirements.requirement: Create admin panel overview dashboard with metrics and charts
missing_requirements.reason: AdminDashboard shows hardcoded mock metrics with no backend integration or real-time data fetching

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement admin user management with account controls and balance adjustments
missing_requirements.reason: UserManagementPage shows placeholder content only; no user list, detail view, or management actions implemented

missing_requirements.reason: FinancialControlPage shows placeholder content only; no approval queues or transaction processing

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement admin plan management for creating and editing investment plans
missing_requirements.reason: PlanManagementPage shows placeholder content only; no plan creation or editing interface

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement admin referral and binary configuration interface
missing_requirements.reason: ReferralBinaryConfigPage shows placeholder content only; no configuration forms or settings

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement admin rewards management for defining and tracking milestones
missing_requirements.reason: RewardsManagementPage shows placeholder content only; no milestone configuration interface

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement admin reports and analytics with charts and CSV export
missing_requirements.reason: ReportsPage shows placeholder content only; no analytics, charts, or export functionality

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement admin notifications system for announcements and campaigns

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement wallet engine in backend for balance tracking, transfers, fees, and currency conversion

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement security features including password hashing, withdrawal verification, fraud monitoring, and rate limiting
missing_requirements.reason: Backend/main.mo shows no security implementation; no password hashing, OTP verification, or rate limiting logic
